lead_paragraph: The seventh and final installment in Lionsgate’s horror-rific franchise took the No. 1 spot at the weekend box office, according to Hollywood.com.
snippet: The seventh and final installment in Lionsgate’s horror-rific franchise took the No. 1 spot at the weekend box office, according to Hollywood.com.

headline.main: ‘Saw 3D’ Takes Top Honors in Horror Genre
headline.print_headline: ‘Saw 3D’ Takes Top Honors In Horror Genre
